item.title: About Me
item.description:
Let’s explain a little about myself (typical about-me webpage).

My name is Inom, I’m web and software developer. Right now I’m working as freelancer.

I like learn something new, for example open-source software (especially if it something lightweight & fast), best practises and automation techniques. I also like web-design, CG - and trying work more with it. They can be very inspiring and eye-catching.

I tried to start running the site for a very long time, but without success, perhaps I lack motivation or something else. But if you see this page it means I successfully started ðŸ™‚.

If you have some ideas or questions, related to website content, feel free to contact with me.
